title: "Kamala Harris mistakenly refers to Ruth Bader Ginsburg as ‘Notorious BIG’ | Raleigh News & Observer"
excerpt: "Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg cemented a place in popular culture with many tributes to her using the moniker Notorious RBG, a play on the name of the rapper Notorious BIG. Kamala Harris mistakenly conflated the nickname with its origin in a speech."
